text: William Arthur Pollon (August 20, 1914 – March 28, 2009) was a Canadian curler. He was the second of the 1953 Brier Champion team (skipped by Ab Gowanlock), representing Manitoba. ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1914 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:Sportspeople from Dauphin, Manitoba Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Art Pollon
